attributes.action: Work to prevent first bus from leaving cornwall
attributes.additional_details: Because thousands of Cornwall residents rely on public transportation specifically first bus as they operate county wide and without them there would be minimal options such as the train or small unreliable private transport companies.
attributes.background: Offer more funding or implement a new policy that requires public transportation to be cheap and easily accessible in rural areas of the country such as Devon and cornwall.

rejection.details: Matter for particular local authorities to fund and make operational decisions on
